DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion after giving 2000 mg 14C-SLV334 via a 1-hour infusion. The absolute bioavailability will also be determined.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate ADME of 14C Labeled SLV334 After an i.v. Infusion
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria healthy nonsmoking subjects Exclusion Criteria QTc > 430 ms; positive drug screen
DOC.keyword: 14C labeled ADME (Aborption Distribution Metabolism and Elimination) study
